title: ROCAS Chromatic Watch Face

description: Chromatic is a 3Dynamic and colorful digital Watch Face for Android Wear devices.Features:✰ Designed for Round and Square Watches✰ 10 color themes✰ Moto360 Chin frame✰ Mobile and Watch battery✰ Full date✰ Seconds✰ Full, clean or optimized Low Bit ambient modeOptions:Settings are accessible via the Android Wear Companion App on your phone. Simply select Chromatic and click on the Gear Icon to open the settings panel.✰ Theme selection, choose between ten handcrafted color themes (Pop Art, Fruit Punch, Tropical, Sunset, Lemonade, Solar, Lagoon, Tangerine, Nightlife, Ruby)✰ Frame selection, select the regular or custom Moto360 frame (round watches only)✰ Use European time (24h)✰ Turn off 3D Wake up animations ✰ Ambient mode type, full, clean or optimized Low Bit.If you have any problems with the application, please don’t rate us 1-star and contact us directly at rocas.watchfaces@gmail.com.We’re committed to providing quality products and technical support to all our users. descriptionHTML:
Chromatic is a 3Dynamic and colorful digital Watch Face for Android Wear devices.

Features:

✰ Designed for Round and Square Watches
✰ 10 color themes
✰ Moto360 Chin frame
✰ Mobile and Watch battery
✰ Full date
✰ Seconds
✰ Full, clean or optimized Low Bit ambient mode


Options:
Settings are accessible via the Android Wear Companion App on your phone. Simply select Chromatic and click on the Gear Icon to open the settings panel.

✰ Theme selection, choose between ten handcrafted color themes (Pop Art, Fruit Punch, Tropical, Sunset, Lemonade, Solar, Lagoon, Tangerine, Nightlife, Ruby)
✰ Frame selection, select the regular or custom Moto360 frame (round watches only)
✰ Use European time (24h)
✰ Turn off 3D Wake up animations
✰ Ambient mode type, full, clean or optimized Low Bit.

If you have any problems with the application, please don’t rate us 1-star and contact us directly at rocas.watchfaces@gmail.com.
We’re committed to providing quality products and technical support to all our users.



Made with love in Montreal♥
comments: Best Watch Face for Android Wear Of all of the watch faces I own, I use this one the most. As a Moto 360 user, I find many faces are designed for a completely circular watch, so part of the watch face is blocked by the "flat tire". This face has a Moto 360 mode which flattens out @ the 6 o'clock position so the face is intact. It also has several color scheme, so I can coordinate with what I'm wearing or choose a scheme to suit mood or the occasion. Well worth the price, particularly for Moto 360 owners.
Right 15% cut off on Moto 360 v2 The right side of the screen is cut off on the moto 360 v2. Will rate at 5 stars once this is fixed. Tried rebooting and reinstalling to no avail.

Beautiful watch face, but a large chunk of the right side is cut off on my Moto 360 v2...sort of like an extra "flat tire" effect on the right side.  This would be a five star watch face if not for this issue.

Fantastic! This is my new favorite watch face! It looks great on my G Watch R and the ambient mode options are perfect! Too many watch faces don't put any thought into ambient mode, so it's great to see this one actually look great in ambient. Keep up the good work!
Huawei Watch compatibility Unfortunately it looks terrible on Huawei Watch.

Right side & btw cutt off Huawei watch. Bottom and right side are cut off no matter what I do. The colors are also not as vibrant as the pictures and are super dull. Will try to contact to get a fix/answer
